article.title: Welcome to the Westchester U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Westchester U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Covering the Hudson Valley, Capital Region and North Country

The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized New York companies develop international markets.

Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify and evaluate international partners
  • Navigate international documentation challenges
  • Create market entry strategies
  • Navigate other export related issues

The U.S. Export Assistance Center located in Westchester is part of an international network of global professionals. We have offices in over 70 countries.

For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please reviewour services.

FeaturedEvent

​

A Unique Opportunity To Expand Your Business in Greater China!

​​The DISCOVER GLOBAL MARKETS: Greater China Business Forum is a two-day conference that will provide numerous opportunities for your company to learn from experts with real-world experience in Greater China markets. Join the U.S. Department of Commerce on October 7-8, 2014 in New York City for a unique opportunity to gain insights and contacts to help you access export opportunities in Greater China.

  • Meet one-on-one with U.S. Commercial Service diplomats.
  • Acquire practical and actionable market intelligence on the world's fastest-growing major economy.
  • Obtain the resources necessary to succeed in the challenging, but rewarding markets of Greater China.
  • Any U.S. company that is already an experienced exporter and is seeking to learn how to successfully sell its products and services in the Greater China region should consider joining the Forum.

Please visitwww.export.gov/newyork/discoverfor registration and more information!​


Local Ways to Increase Your Exports

  • Stay tuned for upcoming opportunities in your area!​
